title: New Dawn Ep. 09
brief_description: Last in a series of nine animated films on the history of Western Civilization. Concentrates on the war of liberation in Guinea-Bissau during the 1960s and 1970s, suggesting that through solidarity, co-operation and the ‘people’s union’, other Third World countries would be able to get their freedom and dignity. (English version by the Tricontinental Film Center)
